entries.title: The Trump administration wants to make it easier to fire career officials in senior positions across the government
The Justice Department released what it says is its final trove of files related to the late Jeffrey Epstein. Here are some takeaways on what we know so far.

European governments are preparing for war with Russia. A newly released wargame suggests they aren’t ready.

A new federal school-choice tax credit has set off a power struggle over how much control states will have. Billions are at stake

President Trump doubled-down on his view that Republicans should “nationalize” voting in the U.S.
Stephen Miller called Alex Pretti a “domestic terrorist” after the VA nurse was killed by federal agents, a rare misstep for Miller, the White House aide stoking Trump’s boundary-pushing impulses.
